,Robin5555,2011-06-09T00:49Z,"How To Make 350 mb Movie File : ---
1. Just Install It And The Time Of Installation It Takes 4 Different Soft wares From Net.
2. After Installation Completes, In The First Page You Click To Add.
3.""New Job"" Tag Will Appear. Now You Are To Make 5 Tasks In That Page.

column2: A. Select A video File ( 700 mb ) You Want To Stream..
B. Change CQ To 2-Pass In The Mode Field..
C. Enable Lock Size & Set To 350 mb Or As You Wish ( Left Click To Check Box On )..
E. Select Output Area Where You Want To Save Your Compressed File..

column1: 4. Press "" Done ""... & Your 350 mb Movie File Will Be created Automatically !
1. Bear In Mind One Thing ( v. Imp ) --- ( 30 Minutes = 100 mb ).
So You May Have 700 mb File With Movie Length Just 60 Minutes.Then You Can Compress It To 220 mb
File Instead Of 350 mb. Video Quality Will Not Suffer !
2. You Can Compress Anything To Its Half Length ( Say - 400 mb File To 200 mb File ).
3. It's A Batch Processing System, So You Can Add Other Files To The Job Queue.
Time Required : It Depends - I Have SP2, Pentium Dual-Core 2.60 GHz, 2 GB RAM,I Need Only 1 Hour

column3: For 700 mb - 1.0 GB File.High Speed Processor & 4 GB RAM Definitely Takes Less Time.
